{{Disambiguation}}

The term '''poisonous''' may refer to:

== ''Minecraft'' ==
* {{EffectLink|Poison}} status effect
** {{EffectLink|Fatal Poison}}, a variant of this effect, exclusive to {{BE}}
* {{EntityLink|Cave Spider}} mob, which inflicts Poison when it attacks
* {{EntityLink|Bee}} mob, which also inflicts Poison when it attacks
* {{EntityLink|Pufferfish}} mob, which inflicts Poison as a method of defending itself
** {{ItemLink|Pufferfish|link=Pufferfish (item)}} item, which drops from the mob, or can be obtained from fishing
* {{ItemLink|Poisonous Potato}} item, which inflicts Poison when eaten
* {{ItemLink|Spider eye}}, which also inflicts Poison when eaten
* {{ItemLink|Potion of Poison}}
** {{ItemLink|Splash Potion of Poison}}
** {{ItemLink|Lingering Potion of Poison}}
** {{ItemLink|Arrow of Poison}}
